title: Page from Edision High school yearbook
content:
[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132001im_/http:/i.imgur.com/kTOYBGM.png "Hosted by imgur.com")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132001/http:/imgur.com/kTOYBGM)

Can you help identify the font for the "My High School Story" and if possible the subheading text that follows.

Thanks

Font: 

 WisdomScript, Edmondsans 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132001/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: dontbugme

comments.content:
High School (and Revising Memorable Students Moments): [Wisdom Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132001/http:/www.losttype.com/wisdom_script) by James T. Edmonson  
MY/STORY: [Edmondsans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132001/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=edmondsans) also by James T. Edmonson
